definition: The Second Sex (book by Simone de Beauvoir)
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Beauvoir appeals women to seek their fortune in difficulties in "the second sex".
sentences.chinese: 波伏娃在《第二性》中呼籲女性在困境中尋找出路。

sentences.english: Secondary sexual characteristics development and age at menarche are different in urban and rural girls.
sentences.chinese: 第二性徵發育和月經初潮年齡存在城鄉差異。

sentences.english: Sexy to the performance of secondary sexual characteristics, divided naked and reveal shape two categories.
sentences.chinese: 性感多以表現第二性徵爲主，分露體和露形兩大類。

sentences.english: His age is that when secondary sexual characteristics appear.
Female secondary sexual characteristics develop normally.
sentences.chinese: 有正常女性第二性徵發育。

sentences.english: As a boy adolescence, his secondary sex characteristics develop.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個青春期男孩，這是他的第二性徵在發展。

sentences.english: The breast is a secondary sex organ.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺是屬於第二性徵器官。

sentences.english: In the secondary production, the great quantity of artificial supplementary energy depends on external input.
sentences.chinese: 第二性生產的絕大部分人工輔助能依靠系統外輸入。

sentences.english: The output and input ratios of artificial supplementary energy in plantation, poultry and stock-raising are higher than that in fishery.
sentences.chinese: 第二性生產的絕大部分人工輔助能依靠系統外輸入。

sentences.english: He challenges Locke's theory of primary and secondary qualities.
sentences.chinese: 他挑戰洛克關於物質第一性和第二性的理論。

definition: dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
